Date : 25.01.2026

S<NOTICE::

Subject: Open Elective course in 6" Semester

B.Tech. Third Year students (School of Chemical Technology) are required to register for
an Open Elective course in the Six Semester. Open Elective course is to be chosen from
other Departments, i.e. other than the branch of specialization of the student. List of Open

Elective courses offered by different Departments is attached herewith.

Students (School of Chemical Technology) are required to submit their preferences of

Open Elective courses latest by 07.01.2026 through the link given below:

Google Link |
|

https://forms.gle/Go4fetNo47RMcKam9 |
|

(Prof. Vandana Dixit Kaushik)
Dean of Academic Affairs
